content:
This website was created using Doks, a documentation theme built on the Hyas framework powered by Hugo and npm. More information and installation instructions can be found here. You will need Node.js installed, it can be found here.
Building the page locally: Clone the repo, then run the command:
npm run devAdding a new post: npm run create docs/guides/faq.mdDeploying the page on GitHub Pages: Run the command:
npm run buildThen push the changes to GitHub.
summary: Brief description on how this website was made
title: Creating the Website

content:
Guides lead a user through a specific task they want to accomplish, often with a sequence of steps. Writing a good guide requires thinking about what your users are trying to do.

content: DeckTechCentral is a deck list management service for the trading card game Magic: The Gathering. It is being created by Christian Messmer, Paul Shriner, Adir Turgeman, and Luke Vukovich for their Senior Project at PennWest California in Spring 2024.
title: About
